trans-unit.source: Status: Alpha
trans-unit.target: 状态：Alpha

trans-unit.source: Warning: Naming and APIs are still subject to breaking changes!
trans-unit.target: 警告：命名和API仍可能受到重大更改！

trans-unit.source: API
trans-unit.target: API

trans-unit.source: APIs for interacting with the Conjur v5 appliance
trans-unit.target: 用于与Conjur v5设备交互的API。

trans-unit.source: Applies a file-based YAML to a named policy. This method only supports additive changes. Result is a dictionary object constructed from the returned JSON data.
trans-unit.target: 将基于文件的YAML应用到命名的策略上。本方法只支持加法修改。结果是一个由返回的JSON数据构建的字典对象。

trans-unit.source: CLI
trans-unit.target: CLI

trans-unit.source: CLI can either be used with the included executable script:
trans-unit.target: CLI可以与包含的可执行脚本一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Contributing
trans-unit.target: 贡献

trans-unit.source: Currently supported client methods:
trans-unit.target: 目前支持的客户方法。

trans-unit.source: From PyPI
trans-unit.target: 来自PyPI

trans-unit.source: From source
trans-unit.target: 来自来源

trans-unit.source: Gets a variable value based on its ID. Variable is binary data that should be decoded to your system's encoding (e.g. get(variable_id).decode('utf-8').
trans-unit.target: 根据其ID获取变量值。变量是应该解码为系统编码的二进制数据（例如 get(variable_id).decode('utf-8') )。

trans-unit.source: Gets multiple variable values based on their IDs. Variables are returned in a dictionary that maps the variable name to its value.
trans-unit.target: 根据变量的ID获取多个变量值。变量以一个字典的形式返回,该字典将变量名称映射到其值。

trans-unit.source: Installing the code
trans-unit.target: 安装代码

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: Modifies an existing Conjur policy. Data may be explicitly deleted using the !delete, !revoke, and !deny statements. Unlike "replace" mode, no data is ever implicitly deleted. Result is a dictionary object constructed from the returned JSON data.
trans-unit.target: 修改现有的Conjur策略。可以使用 !delete,!revoke,和 !deny 语句来显式删除数据。与 "replace "模式不同的是,任何数据都不会被隐式删除。结果是一个由返回的JSON数据构建的字典对象。

trans-unit.source: Most usage is done by creating a Client instance and then invoking the API on it:
trans-unit.target: 大部分的用法是通过创建一个Client实例,然后对其调用API。

trans-unit.source: Note: On some machines, you have to use pip instead of pip3 but in most cases, you will want to use pip3 if it's available for your platform.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在某些计算机上，必须使用 pip 而不是 pip3 ,但是在大多数情况下，如果平台可使用 pip3 ，则需要使用pip3。

trans-unit.source: Note: Policy to create the variable must have been already loaded otherwise you will get a 404 error during invocation.
trans-unit.target: 注意:创建变量的策略必须已经被加载,否则在调用过程中你会得到一个404错误。

trans-unit.source: Or through the installed module:
trans-unit.target: 或者通过安装的模块。

trans-unit.source: Python3-based API SDK for Conjur OSS. The repo also includes a self-contained CLI tool (conjur-cli) that wraps the API in a simple executable script/binary.
trans-unit.target: 用于Conjur OSS的基于Python3的API SDK 。该 conjur-cli 还包括一个自包含的CLI工具（conjur-cli），该工具将API包装在简单的可执行脚本/二进制文件中。

trans-unit.source: Replaces a named policy with one from the provided file. This is usually a destructive invocation. Result is a dictionary object constructed from the returned JSON data.
trans-unit.target: 用提供的文件中的策略替换命名的策略。这通常是一个破坏性调用。结果是由返回的JSON数据构建的字典对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Python list of all the available resources for the current account.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前账户的所有可用资源的 Python 列表。

trans-unit.source: Sets a variable to a specific value based on its ID.
trans-unit.target: 根据ID设置一个变量的特定值。

trans-unit.source: This project is licensed under Apache License v2.0
trans-unit.target: 该项目已获得Apache License v2.0的许可

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: We store instructions for development and guidelines for how to build and test this project in the CONTRIBUTING.md - please refer to that document if you would like to contribute.
trans-unit.target: 我们在CONTRIBUTING.md中存储了开发说明以及如何构建和测试此项目的准则-如果您想提供帮助，请参阅该文档。

trans-unit.source: With .netrc and .conjurrc settings
trans-unit.target: 使用 .netrc 和 .conjurrc 设置

trans-unit.source: With login ID and password
trans-unit.target: 使用登录ID和密码

trans-unit.source: With login Id and API key
trans-unit.target: 有登录ID和API密钥

trans-unit.source: Write the code same as in the first example but create the client with the following arguments:
trans-unit.target: 编写与第一个例子相同的代码,但创建客户端时使用以下参数。

trans-unit.source: conjur-api-python3
trans-unit.target: conjur-api-python3
